reviews.name: Mother, Jugs & Speed (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Highly entertaining and fun movie! I love the ambulances!
reviews.title: For all you EMS guys...

reviews.name: Mother, Jugs & Speed (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: As Senior Driver for the largest large ambulance company West of the Mississippi, until you got to California, during the 1960's, this movie really hit the nail on the head! When EMT was just being talked about. Those times were a real blast ... and we still saved lives without all of the bells and whistles!
reviews.title: "Almost" totally true and factual.

reviews.name: Mother, Jugs & Speed (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: I love these old movies from the 70s. they never grow old!!
reviews.title: cool movie

reviews.name: Mother, Jugs & Speed (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: Another Comedy Classic With Bill Cosby,Raquel Welch,Harvey Kietal,And Other Supporting Actors & Actresses.Funny Movie From The Beginning Till The End,Bill Cosby Chasing Down The Nuns,His Famous Line "The Devil Made Me Do It".Another Buyers Must We'll Enjoy It Time After Time.Thanks Again Wal*Mart.Com A Happy Customer.
reviews.title: A Fantastic Movie

reviews.name: Mother, Jugs & Speed (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE that Wal-Mart always has such a great selection of movies!
reviews.title: Oldie but goodie!
